data.eml:eml: Revision of the Neotropical genus Coroichlorops Paganelli 2002 (Diptera: Chloropidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Riccardi, Paula Raile, Amorim, Dalton De Souza (2016): Revision of the Neotropical genus Coroichlorops Paganelli 2002 (Diptera: Chloropidae). Zootaxa 4093 (3): 435-443, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4093.3.9
